title.rendered: Adria Airways Agent Office in Morristown NJ, USA

content.rendered:
Adria Airways Adria Airways d.d., formerly Inex-Adria Aviopromet, later Inex-Adria Airways, is the largest airline in Slovenia. It was founded on 1961. The majority of Adria Airways’ business is in scheduled flights, but it also provides charter and ad hoc flights. Adria currently operates to 24 scheduled and 22 charter destinations throughout Europe. Most of the flights are operated out of Ljubljana, the primary hub for Adria Airways, but the airline also provides both scheduled and charter flights out of Pristina and Tirana.

 

Adria Airways Morristown NJ, USA Address:
Networld Communications Corp.
89 Headquarters Plaza North
Suite 1420 Morristown, NJ 07960, USA

Phone:
Toll Free + 1-855-77-ADRIA (2 3742)
+1 (973) 637-1012

Fax: +1 (973) 884- 7245

Email: adria@gsa-northamerica.com

Working hours

Adria Airways Official website: https://www.adria.si/

Adria Airways Online Check-in: www.adria.si/online check-in

Note: Check In Online check-in is available from 24 hours up to 60 minutes before the scheduled departure time.

Check Adria Airways schedule here: www.adria.si/flightschedule

Check Adria Airways flight status here: www.adria.si/flightstatus

Adria Airways customer care number: +386 (0) 1 369 1010

Adria Airways Baggage Allowance

Adria Airways Baggage

View Adria Airways Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage charges in the above link.

Adria Airways – Missed luggage

Please contact the service where the record of lost luggage (for luggage that lasts less than five days) has been filled in, or contact:

Email: lost.found@adria.si
Phone: +386 (0) 4 25 94 339
Working hours: between 8 am and 10 pm

For more details, visit https://www.adria.si/sl/informacije/prtljaga/zamujena-izgubljena-poskodovana-prtljaga/

Adria Airways – Lost luggage

If your luggage is not found within 3 days of check-in,

send the completed Content List together along with the copy of your personal document to the email id: centralbaggage.tracing@adria.si

Download Lost and found form for Adria Airways

Travel during pregnancy in Adria Airways

Pregnancy rules in Adria Airways:

Expectant mothers can travel in Adria Airways till 37 th week of the pregnancy. After 37 th week, a medical certificate is require to travel.

For more details, visit https://www.adria.si/sl/informacije/potniki-s-posebnimi-potrebami/potovanje-v-nosecnosti/

List of Adria Airways Offices around the world

View the Adria Airways offices address, phone number, email through the above link.

Queries handled by Adria Airways Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class, Miles & More
